Drill down the U-D chain one step to find the definition of V, and try to break the definition into one or two addends. <a href="#a2b3d6406d7e75f89f75afce4b23cc012">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend">FAddend</a> is used to represent floating-point addend.

An addend is represented as &lt;C, V&gt;, where the V is a symbolic value, and C is a constant coefficient. A constant addend is represented as &lt;C, 0&gt;.

Definition at line 129 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instcombine/instcombineaddsub-cpp">InstCombineAddSub.cpp</a>.
